author: Alana Duma
title: Shaw Development Ensures Precision with Implementation of CETOL 6σ and GD&T Advisor
text:
Specializing in custom engineering and fluid management, Shaw Development has taken the next step in their quality production initiative with Sigmetrix’ CETOL 6 Sigma tolerance analysis solution and Sigmetrix’ GD&T Advisor . Since their customers include a wide array of industries including construction and mining, trucking, locomotive, agricultural and military, universal precision is essential to the Shaw Development robust design and quality production process. “As a custom engineering specialist, robustness and product quality is essential to our design process” affirmed Bart Baker, Shaw Development’s Senior Designer. “CETOL 6 Sigma and GD&T Advisor ensure the superior value of each custom product through the analysis and modification of tolerances, and correct application of semantic GD&T annotations, reinforcing Shaw Development’s reputation as the leading provider of innovative solutions in global markets. We chose Sigmetrix because of their long history of successful mechanical engineering products. CETOL 6 Sigma and GD&T Advisor both directly integrate into the CAD environment and this is an integral part in improving our design robustness and optimizing our manufacturing goals.”
Sigmetrix’ revolutionary solutions take the complexity and frequent inaccuracy out of tolerance analyses and GD&T definition. Sigmetrix’s software solutions unite the “ideal” world of perfect product designs with the “real” world impacts of manufacturing and assembly imperfections. This understanding allows companies to manufacture high-quality products at the lowest possible costs.
“Sigmetrix provides the dominant solutions for GD&T and tolerance analysis in many industries”, remarked Sigmetrix President and CEO, Chris Wilkes. “We are excited about the integration of a complete GD&T and tolerance analysis solution within Shaw Development’s design department, ensuring that they can continue to deliver the innovative, high-quality and reliable products they are known for.”
For more information on CETOL 6 Sigma visit http://www.sigmetrix.com/products/cetol-tolerance-analysis-software/
For more information on GD&T Advisor visit our http://www.sigmetrix.com/products/gdt-software/
About Sigmetrix
Sigmetrix is a global provider of comprehensive, easy-to-use software solutions that help users achieve robust designs through tolerance analysis and the correct application of GD&T. With over 20 years of research and development, Sigmetrix products eliminate the error between as-designed assemblies and as-produced products. For more information, visit their website at http://www.sigmetrix.com .
About Shaw Development
Shaw Development LLC engineers, validates, and manufacturers fluid system components and subsystems for on-highway, military, off-road heavy-duty vehicle applications. Shaw Development can also provide custom turnkey fluid system solutions for the storage and transfer of the vehicle’s service fluids such as fuels, hydraulic oil, engine coolant, and Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF, AdBlue). For more information, visit their website at http://www.shawdev.com
